sentences.en: Don't humiliate his intelligence, that just like in mercy killing.
sentences.cn: 不要侮辱了他的智慧, 那无异于慈悲杀人.

sentences.en: Her boss humiliated her in front of all her colleagues.
sentences.cn: 她的老板在所有同事面前羞辱了她。

sentences.en: I didn't want to humiliate her in front of her colleagues.
sentences.cn: 我不想当着她同事们的面令她难堪。

sentences.en: It means not to humiliate others but to offence sometimes.
sentences.cn: 这并不意味着侮辱对方,但有时可能引起冒犯.

sentences.en: It was not my intention to hurt or humiliate her.
sentences.cn: 我不是有意要伤她使她下不来台的.

sentences.en: Shanxi coal boss purchase Mission: to humiliate a group of 10 million moneybags?
sentences.cn: 山西煤老板购房团: 这群千万富翁到底羞辱了谁?

sentences.en: Sometimes people feel safer using body language to intimidate or humiliate others.
sentences.cn: 他们为什么会觉得用肢体语言去羞辱别人更安全呢?

sentences.en: The press has the power to stimulate, alarm, enrage, amuse, humiliate, annoy.
sentences.cn: 新闻界有激动, 警告, 激怒, 娱乐, 侮辱的作用.

sentences.en: There are people who want to humiliate you and grind you down.
sentences.cn: 有一些人会想要让你难堪，欺负你。

sentences.en: They break up with you, fire you, leave you, or humiliate you.
sentences.cn: 他们和你断绝关系, 开除你, 离开你, 或者羞辱你.

sentences.en: They pay me empty compliments which only humiliate me.
sentences.cn: 他们虚情假意地恭维我,这只能使我感到羞辱.

sentences.en: What right had they to bully and humiliate people like this?
sentences.cn: 凭什么把人欺侮到这个地步 呢 ?

sentences.en: When the scoundrel tried to humiliate the girl, the police came.
sentences.cn: 歹徒欲凌辱那个姑娘时, 警察来到了.

sentences.en: Why hang around just to see him humiliate himself in front of the whole village?
sentences.cn: 为什么呆在这儿看他在整个村子的人面前出丑?

sentences.en: You should not humiliate her in public.
sentences.cn: 你不应该在公共场合出她的丑.

sentences.en: You stalked this guy for 20 years just for the shot to humiliate him?
sentences.cn: 你追踪了这家伙20年就为了给他点羞辱?

words.tran_cn: 屈辱（humiliate的过去式）；使…丢脸，使…蒙羞

trans.tran_cn: 羞辱, 使丢脸, 耻辱
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel ashamed or stupid, especially when other people are present

trans.tran_cn: 使蒙羞，使丢脸，使出丑，屈辱，羞辱
trans.tran_en: to make someone feel ashamed or stupid, especially when other people are present
